[Groovy] Class ExternalGatherer

java.lang.Object
  Gatherer
      ExternalGatherer

class ExternalGatherer
extends Gatherer

This class allows external scripts to be used to gather metrics

def EXT_OUTPUT_VALUE(def variables)
